title: Elon Musk, Under Financial Pressure, Pushes to Make Money From Twitter
description: The billionaire and his advisers have discussed adding paid direct messages, fees to watch videos and other features to the service.

title: Amazon, Lyft and Other Tech Companies Announce Job Cuts and Hiring Freezes
description: Amazon said it was pausing corporate hiring, while Lyft and Stripe said they were cutting jobs.
